5A05.detail_en:
Use a fleet with 1 [[CL|Light Cruiser]]/[[CLT|Torpedo Cruiser]]/[[CT|Training Cruiser]], 2 [[DD|Destroyers]]/[[DE|Coastal Defense Ships]], and up to 3 additional ships to complete '''ONE''' of following requirements:
1) Sortie to Worlds [[2-1]], [[2-2]], [[2-3]], [[2-4]], and [[2-5]]. Obtain an A-rank (or higher) at each boss node once.
2) Sortie a fleet to Worlds [[5-3]] and [[5-5]]. Obtain an A-rank (or higher) at each boss node once.
3) Sortie a fleet to World [[6-5]]. Obtain an A-rank (or higher) at the boss node once.
5A05.label: 5A05
5A05.title: 五周年任務【伍：五周年艦隊出撃！】

SN06.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}} as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)}}.
SN06.label: SN06
SN06.title: 「翔鶴」に艦攻「村田隊」を配置転換せよ！

SN07.detail_en: Obtain a B-rank (or higher) in [[Exercises (PvP)|Exercises]] 4 times within the same day.
SN07.label: SN07
SN07.title: FS作戦に備え、艦隊練度向上に努めよ！

SN08.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}} as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)}}. Scrap 2 {{EquipmentLink|Tenzan}}.
SN08.label: SN08
SN08.title: 「工廠」”機種転換

SN09.label: SN09
SN09.title: 西部方面派遣艦隊、出撃せよ！

SN10.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Zuikaku}}, {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}}, and {{ShipLink|Zuihou}} in your first fleet. Then create a [[Combined Fleet|Carrier Task Force]].
SN10.label: SN10
SN10.title: 空母機動部隊「第三艦隊」を編成せよ！

Su09.detail_en:
Collect 50 Rice, 15 Umeboshi, and 10 Tea. Then, have a [[DD|Destroyer]] as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher}} in her '''first''' slot and a {{EquipmentLink|Type 2 Depth Charge}} in her '''second''' slot.
'''※ The equipped rocket launcher must be unlocked.'''
'''※ The equipped rocket launcher will be converted to the reward listed.'''
'''※ The prepared items will be consumed upon quest completion.'''

Su09.title: 主計科拡張任務【日の丸弁当、量産！】

WB02.detail_en: Sortie a fleet with a level 100 (or higher) flagship and up to 5 additonal ships to World [[4-3]].  Obtain a S-rank at the boss node.

WC01.detail_en: Obtain a B-rank (or higher) in [[Exercises (PvP)|Exercises]] twice.

WC01.title: 式の準備！(その弐)
